amendment.description: To make a technical correction to a project for Rickenbacker Airport, Columbus, Ohio.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4214 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6359) To make a technical correction to a project for Rickenbacker Airport, Columbus, Ohio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4214 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4214 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
